comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The paddle-steamer ferry 'St Leonards' (North Shore Steam Ferry Company) started service in 1882, and ended up as a wharf pontoon in Hunters Hill. [Ref: Pictorial History of Ferries Sydney etc - Graeme Anndrews - Reed 1982] The Navy acquired 'Watonga' in 1885, when it became Admiralty House and had a second storey added. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Admiralty_House,_Sydney
